## BlendingState.setBlendEquation() method

Sets the blending equations for RGB channels and the alpha channel

**Signature:**

```typescript
setBlendEquation(rgb: BlendEquation, alpha: BlendEquation): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rgb | [BlendEquation](doc/markdown/./device.blendequation.md) | The blending equation for RGB channels |
|  alpha | [BlendEquation](doc/markdown/./device.blendequation.md) | The blending equation for the alpha channel |

**Returns:**

this

self
